welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Duncan! This charming city in the heart of the United States is known for its rich history, beautiful landscapes, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders that Duncan has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Halliburton Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Halliburton Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights, with a lounge and facilities for pilots and crew members.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal buildings for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Henry Post AAF Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Henry Post AAF Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods via air.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
